name: Retinol Neck Cream - Advanced Neck Firming Cream with AH8 for Crepey Skin, Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, Neck & Body to Tighten, Lift & Reduce Wrinkles 4.23oz
short_description: 【AH8 + Retinol + Hyaluronic Acid Complex】Firms, Lifts & Hydrates. This targeted neck firming cream treatment is formulated with a powerful trio of ingredients. Retinol, a gold-standard ingredient, works to support skin's natural collagen production. Hyaluronic Acid deeply replenishes moisture, plumping the skin. Together, they work to improve overall skin elasticity and firmness, contributing to a reduction in the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles with consistent use. This formula stands out as a superior choice among neck creams for tightening and firming.

【Hyaluronic Acid for Deep Hydration & Plumping】This neck cream is infused with Hyaluronic Acid, a powerful humectant that attracts and locks in moisture. This helps to deeply hydrate, temporarily plump the skin, and enhance its supple feel, making it an essential part of any neck tightening and lifting routine.

【Retinol for Skin Renewal & Smoothing】Formulated with Retinol to encourage skin renewal. This process helps to gradually diminish the appearance of fine lines and support skin firmness in the delicate neck and chest area with consistent use. Experience the transformative results of go pure neck firming cream for visibly smoother skin.

【Lightweight & Fast-Absorbing】For Day & Night Use. The non-greasy formula of this neck firming cream absorbs quickly, making it suitable for daily use under makeup or before bed. Designed to be gentle on most skin types, it seamlessly integrates into your skincare regimen for effective neck tightening and lifting.

【Roller Design】Featuring a uniquely designed massage roller head that seamlessly dispenses this advanced neck cream. The leak-proof structure doubles absorption efficiency, delivering an optimal high-performance and effortless experience for you, solidifying its status as a premier go pure neck firming cream for targeted care.

name: Neck Firming Cream with Roller, Anti-Aging Neck & Chest Cream with Multi Peptide + Collagen + Hyaluronic Acid + Ceramide, Pro-Xylane, Panthenol, Smooths Wrinkles & Fine Lines (5.29 FL OZ)
short_description: 【Firming and Repairing Neck & Chest】This neck cream contains a powerful, scientifically formulated blend of multi peptides (including AH-8), multi collagen, caffeine, and Proxylane. Specifically formulated for the neck and chest, it leaves skin smoother, firmer, and more elastic. It effectively repairs dry neck wrinkles, pseudo-neck wrinkles, dynamic neck wrinkles, while diminishing true static lines (including turkey lines), gravity-induced wrinkles/sagging lines, and combination wrinkles.

【Peptide & Collagen Complex】Multi Peptides reduce dynamic neck lines by regulating muscle contraction; multi collagen promotes collagen production; caffeine promotes microcirculation, reducing sagging and wrinkles caused by gravity; and pro-xylane plumps the skin and diminishes dry neck lines. Continued use of our neck cream revitalizes the neck, resulting in a smoother, more even contour and a youthful glow.

【Hydrating & Barrier-Boosting】 Packed with potent moisturizing ingredients, Hyaluronic Acid Complex and Panthenol deliver deep, long-lasting hydration to the neck and chest, while Ceramide Complex strengthens the skin’s moisture barrier. Niacinamide Complex refines texture, leaving the area smooth, supple, and nourished. This lightweight neck cream absorbs quickly, ideal for daily care.

【Larger Capacity & Unique Three-Roller Design】Compared to traditional neck creams (larger in size, up to 5.29 fl oz), this innovative neck cream features three smooth steel rollers for even, quick, and easy application to the delicate skin of the neck and chest, avoiding messy hands (1 massage = 188 hand massages). The ergonomic design conforms to the natural contours of the neck. The built-in massager makes this neck cream more convenient, comfortable, and efficient to use, and helps the ingredients absorb more fully and quickly.

【Safe & Easy to Use】Squeeze a small amount, apply to neck & chest with the 3-roller applicator, massage until absorbed.Gentle and non-greasy, non-comedogenic, free of lactose, gluten, sulfates, preservatives, and irritating oils, suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. For best results, it is recommended to use it every morning and evening. Continued use can bring about significant and stable improvement. Do a skin test first.

short_description: Firming Face & Neck Cream — A premium anti-aging moisturizer formulated with retinol, collagen, and hyaluronic acid to support firmer-looking skin on the face, neck, and décolleté while delivering lasting hydration.
